manifest.name: The Ecologist's Pack
manifest.author: Donegeon Team
manifest.description: Help protect the planet with quests focused on conservation, recycling, and sustainability.

quests.title: Recycling Captain
quests.description: Ensure all recyclables for the day are sorted and placed in the correct bin.

quests.title: Energy Saver
quests.description: Be the last one to leave a room? Turn off the lights!

quests.title: Water Conservationist
quests.description: Turn off the water while brushing your teeth.

quests.title: Compost Contributor
quests.description: Add appropriate food scraps to the compost bin.

quests.title: Litter Pickup
quests.description: Spend 10 minutes picking up litter in your neighborhood or a local park.

quests.title: Research an Endangered Animal
quests.description: Learn about an endangered animal and share what you learned.

gameAssets.name: Reusable Water Bottle
gameAssets.description: A durable water bottle for your avatar.

gameAssets.name: Solar Powered Gadget
gameAssets.description: A small solar-powered toy or charger.

gameAssets.name: Tree Sapling
gameAssets.description: A real-world reward: donate to have a tree planted in your name.
